text: Kulamulidwe kukwenu jenumanja kuputa ngondo kutendaga jalakwejo jili jakuwenjedwa kukwenu, nambotu komboleka kuchiwenga chindu kutendaga chili chambone kukwenu, soni nikomboleka kuchinonyela chindu kutendaga chili chakusakala kukwenu, sano Allah ni jwaakumanyilila, nambo wanganyammwe ngankumanyilila
